main-page.description:
Students of all faculties have at their disposal modern laboratories, specialized IT, graphic and design laboratories. The university platforms over 600 programs in 40 laboratories equipped with hardware and the latest software. Thanks to license agreements signed with companies from the IT industry, students have constant access to updates and the latest versions of the software.

Exercises and laboratory classes are held in groups of sixteen. During classes in computer laboratories, each student has a separate computer at their disposal. Persons preparing their diploma theses have unlimited access to specialist laboratories.

The training also takes place in multimedia laboratories, which include: a professional recording studio, a graphics laboratory in BlueBox, a sound production laboratory, etc. Students also have at their disposal a professional photo studio, painting studios, workshop graphics studio, etc.

Throughout the course of studies, the university provides intensive language and optional Japanese. PJATK is the only official research center in Poland that certifies the acquisition of the Japanese language forms applicable on the list. You also have the option of choosing a different foreign language for higher semesters. Information on learning foreign languages ​​can be found on the website of the Foreign Language Center.

The entire campus is covered with a wireless Wi-Fi company that allows you to help over the Internet with your phone. In addition, the university is recognized by the Eduroam confederation, thanks to which students can use the Internet at many universities around the world.
